# Style

# Component

### CSS

```css
.component {
  display: flex;
  justify-content: center;
  align-items: center;
}

.message {
  color: #333;
}
```

### SCSS

```scss
.component {
  display: flex;
  justify-content: center;
  align-items: center;

  .message {
    color: #333;
  }
}
```

### Tailwind w/ @apply

```css
.component {
  @apply flex justify-center items-center;
}

.message {
  @apply text-slate-800;
}
```
